vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in EtherStore.withdrawFunds (patch_12.sol#14-26):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_weiToWithdraw)() (patch_12.sol#21-24)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (patch_12.sol#22)
	- frozenAccount (patch_12.sol#25)
	- lastWithdrawTime (patch_12.sol#23)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_12.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.0 (patch_12.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_weiToWithdraw' of EtherStore.withdrawFunds (patch_12.sol#14) is not in mixedCase
